durationInMs-comment: Duration of the YOU DIED text in milliseconds.
fontSize-comment: Font Size of the YOU DIED text.
fontColorHex-comment: Color of the YOU DIED text.
volume-comment: Volume of the sound effect. Set to 0 to disable the sound.
customString-comment: Text to show instead of the default. Leave blank to use default for your current language. Use / to add multiple options.
